title: Britney Spears Sells Her Music
summary: Britney Spears, a famous pop singer, has sold the rights to all her songs. She sold them to a company called Primary Wave for about $200 million. Britney is known for hit songs like '...Baby One More Time' and 'Toxic'. She has sold over 150 million records worldwide. This sale happened after she ended a conservatorship, which was a legal arrangement where her father controlled her life. Other singers like Bruce Springsteen and Justin Bieber have also sold their music rights. Britney said she will not make music anymore, but her songs will still be played. The exact details of the sale are not public.

background_read: Britney Spears is a pop star who became famous in the late 1990s with songs like '...Baby One More Time'. She has sold many records and is one of the best-selling artists. Recently, she ended a conservatorship that lasted 13 years, where her father managed her money and decisions. This sale of her music rights is a big deal because it means she now has more control over her life and money. Other singers have done similar things to secure their futures.
